title: Input schema for conversion.ai scraper
description:
Below you can provide param which will be used to set parameters to conversion.ai for skills.
Important: Proxy is required to use this solution

zipCode.title: Zip Code
zipCode.description: The target zip code you want to scrape data on Crime Grade.

maxRequestRetries.title: Max request retries
maxRequestRetries.description: How many times a page will be retried in case of being blocked or other errors.

proxy.title: Proxy configuration
proxy.description: Proxy is required to run this actor! Either use Apify RESIDENTIAL proxy, or provide your own proxy servers. Non-RESIDENTIAL proxy groups usually don't work.

extendOutputFunction.title: Extend Output Function
extendOutputFunction.description: Add or remove properties on the output object or omit the output returning null
extendOutputFunction.sectionDescription: You can change the output of the items for your dataset here, or add additional behavior on the scraper.

extendScraperFunction.title: Extend Scraper Function
extendScraperFunction.description: Advanced function that allows you to extend the default scraper functionality, allowing you to manually perform actions on the page
extendScraperFunction.prefill:
async ({ page, request, itemSpec, customData, Apify }) => {
 
}

customData.title: Custom data
customData.description: Any data that you want to have available inside the Extend Output/Scraper Function

maxConcurrency.title: Max Concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Max number of allowed instances running in parallel. More instances need more memory!

debugLog.title: Debug Log
debugLog.description: Enable a more verbose logging to be able to understand what's happening during the scraping
